info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 10 at 1:19PM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...Heavy snow showers will impact portions of western Madison and Beaverhead Counties through 200 PM MST... At 116 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking heavy snow showers over western Beaverhead county. Movement was east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Heavy snow and half mile or less visibility. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hazardous driving conditions. Locations impacted include... Dillon, Twin Bridges, Jackson, Wisdom, Silver Star, Dell, Grant, Bannack Pass, Melrose, Wise River, Dewey, Bannack, Waterloo, Glen, Beaverhead Rock State Park, Polaris, Clark Canyon and Bannack State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
